item.title: Passports in London
item.description: The United Kingdom is still part of the EU, so for the time being ID cards are enough for Europeans and French nationals to visit. However, if you plan on staying in London for a while, we advise you to have a passport to be prepared for any eventuality, and if you do not know how to do so, donâ€™t panic. What to do There are two scenarios: those who have to renew their passport and those who are applying for the first time.
